info.name: Compact Facebook Messenger
info.description:
Is facebook messenger (messenger.com) very big for your screen? 
A compacted left toolbar that only shows contact/group images that is expanded when the mouse is over, along with other features will give you a more compact experience.
info.additionalInfo:
(based on the idea of "Facebook Messanger Nice, Tidy and more responsive" created by Krzychu)


WARNING:
this style is broken since messenger.com has changed its style to incorporate a small toolbar on the left

I will try to fix it when facebook finishes the changes
